page.title: 06Playing.
page.content: When I play outside I play with my bike or my roller boots. Sometimes we play with skipping ropes and the song is "Granny's in the kitchen, doing a bit of stitching, in comes the bogeyman and pushes granny out." Sometimes we play with our baby dolls but we mostly play on my two swings. We all play "Fox and Hounds" in the {greenbelt.}The{greenbelt is a field in front of my house. I play football on a five-a-side pitch at the Institute with my friends. We play in an old tree in my back garden. We get five cap guns and some caps and we play firing at each other. We play some games on the computer like "Grog's Revenge". We also play "Ghostbusters" and "Spy Hunter".
